News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Guiseley AFC
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Guiseley AFC
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Guiseley AFC
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League annual Daggers Against Racism Day home match against Guiseley AFC on Saturday
News.description:
The Daggers currently sit 2nd in the Vanarama National League after their 4-1 away win over Southport last Saturday.

Guiseley are currently 20th in the table and two points away from the relegation zone after their 2-1 over Sutton United on Tuesday night.

Previous Five Results

Daggers
Southport 1-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-2 Chester
Tranmere 0-2 Daggers
North Ferriby 0-4 Daggers
Daggers 3-0 Braintree

Guiseley AFC
Guiseley 2-1 Sutton United
Guiseley 1-1 Eastleigh
Wrexham 3-1 Guiseley
Macclesfield 1-2 Guiseley
Nuneaton Town 6-1 Guiseley

Team News
Jake Howells could be in contention to start after making his first appearance for the Daggers in their win over Southport last week. Williams, Robinson and Howell are all expected to miss out.

Previous Meetings
This will be the second meeting between the two teams after the reverse fixture earlier this season on August 13th, where the Daggers ran out 2-0 winners thanks to goals from Assombalonga and Hawkins.

Fixtures
There will be eleven Vanarama National League fixtures this Saturday, with Sutton United and Lincoln City who were due to play each other this weekend, both in the Emirates FA Cup fifth round. All KO's 3:00pm. 
Barrow v Torquay
Bromley v Solihull Moors
Daggers v Guiseley
Gateshead v Forest Green
Woking v Southport
Eastleigh v Tranmere
Macclesfield v Braintree
Boreham Wood v York
North Ferriby v Dover
Maidstone v Chester
Wrexham v Aldershot

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.
 
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
